------------------
geotypisch
A CSS+(X)HTML-based template for a weblog.
Designed by Otto Coster (http://www.ottonova.nl/)

Pure CSS and XHTML, no images, no JavaScript. Fonts used are Georgia and Arial.
This template contains 2 example posts, one with comments, a comment form and a sidebar. Boxes are build using the 16 column 960 grid system.

------------------

Dear friends,

thank you for downloading this file.

You can freely use this template for both your private and commercial projects, including software, online services, templates and themes.
